name: lovense_tool
description: Control Lovense hardware for intimate physical feedback. Supports vibration patterns, rotation, and pump functions via Game Mode API. Connect toys using Lovense Remote app in Game Mode. Actions: get_toys (list connected devices), vibrate (set intensity 0-20), pattern (custom sequences), preset (pulse/wave/fireworks/earthquake), rotate (for Nora etc), pump (for Max etc), multi_function (combine functions), stop (emergency stop all).

intensity.description: Intensity level 0-20 (0=off, 20=max). Used for vibrate, rotate, and pump actions.

duration.description: Duration in seconds (0=continuous until stopped). Works with all actions.

toy.description: Target specific toy by ID (from get_toys). Empty string targets all connected toys.

pattern_sequence.description: Semicolon-separated intensity values (0-20) for pattern action. Example: '5;10;15;20;15;10;5' creates a wave pattern.

preset_name.description: Built-in pattern name for preset action

rotate_intensity.description: Rotation intensity 0-20 for multi_function action (toys with rotation motor)

pump_intensity.description: Pump/inflation level 0-20 for multi_function action (toys with pump like Max)

loop_running_sec.description: Seconds to run per cycle when looping vibration patterns

loop_pause_sec.description: Seconds to pause between loop cycles
